languages.text: "Чем было продиктовано ваше решение {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}оставить{/d} во главе планеты еретичку и слугу {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Есть сведения, что губернатор Вьятт не слишком хорошо справляется со своими обязанностями. Она утаивала информацию о происходящем в колонии. И, тем не менее, вы оставили ее на посту. Чем объясняется подобное расположение?"

languages.text: "What drove you to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}give{/d} a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "Чем было продиктовано ваше решение {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}оставить{/d} во главе планеты еретичку и слугу {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "What drove you to give a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the Archenemy?"
"What drove you to give a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the Archenemy?"
"What drove you to give a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}?"
"What drove you to give a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}?"
"What drove you to give a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}?"

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の従者と異端者に星を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}任せざる{/d}を得なかった理由を答えよ」
languages.original_text: "What drove you to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}give{/d} a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の従者と異端者に星を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}任せざる{/d}を得なかった理由を答えよ」

languages.original_text: "What drove you to give a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the Archenemy?"

languages.text: “你为什么会将一颗行星的掌控权交给异端分子，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}交给{/d}{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的仆人？”
languages.original_text: "What drove you to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}give{/d} a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: “你为什么会将一颗行星的掌控权交给异端分子，交给{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的仆人？”

languages.text: «¿Qué le impulsó a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}dejar{/d} un planeta a cargo de una hereje al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}?».
languages.original_text: "What drove you to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}give{/d} a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué le impulsó a dejar un planeta a cargo de una hereje al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}?».

languages.text: « Pour quelle raison avez-vous laissé une hérétique et servante du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} à la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}tête{/d} d'une planète ? »
languages.original_text: "What drove you to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}give{/d} a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: « Pour quelle raison avez-vous laissé une hérétique et servante du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} à la tête d'une planète ? »

languages.text: "Was hat Euch dazu veranlasst, den Planeten in die Hände einer Ketzerin und Dienerin des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}zu geben{/d}?"
languages.original_text: "What drove you to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}give{/d} a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Was hat Euch dazu veranlasst, den Planeten in die Hände einer Ketzerin und Dienerin des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} zu geben?"

languages.text: "Gezegenin yönetimine {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} hizmetkârı bir fanatiği {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}getirme{/d} sebebin neydi?"
languages.original_text: "What drove you to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}give{/d} a planet into the charge of a heretic and a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir gezegenin yönetimine {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın hizmetkârı bir fanatiği getirme sebebin neydi?"
